Bonjour, j'ai dÃ©couvert que j'Ã©tais pr:
Hi, I found out I probably caught {{diseaseName}}. I am writing you because we met during my contagious period between {{period}}, and I may have contaminated you.

I know this is not a pleasant message to receive, but I wanted wanted to notify you because it is important you take all necessary precautions to protect yourself and your close ones. Even without symptoms, it is possible you may already be contagious.

To break the chain of transmission, I recommend you also use the website I just used to notify you: {{url}}

PS: The website was built by a nonprofit, it is completely free and anonymous.
